Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following 
an earlier door problem at Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra tim

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Grand.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
